title: Diamond Heart
description: With her idealistic beliefs already shaken by the discovery of her late father's affair, photojournalist Paige Frasier is blackmailed into investigating the latest tabloid scandal involving a press-hating billionaire.Lucas McCord knows first hand what damage the press can inflict and he'll do anything to protect himself and the people he loves. But when Paige tricks her way into his life, he realizes that the secret he guards is worth far more than his reputation, and even Paige's broken heart is a price heâ€™s prepared to pay.
author: Tricia Jones
